text: Today we inaugurated the San Juan de Dios Hospital in Curicó and this is how we fulfill our commitment to build 9 hospitals in less than 24 months.
And in San Clemente, we inaugurated the Villa Las Palmas, San José and Doña Estela housing complexes, which will benefit 357 families.
During these 3 days of reconstruction tour we will open 1400 homes. 1400 families will start a new life!

In only 2 years Chileans have been able to rebuild more than two thirds of the damage caused on 27 / F
In addition, we have regained our ability to grow, create jobs and improve wages.
